Our game is based around custom textures. With the help of our upcoming Texture Creator, you'll be able to not only upload your own textures, but create them in-game.

Freedom is key. That's why we want to let the players choose in which direction the game is going to go. Head over to the Texture manager in the top-left corner to upload your own, custom player spritesheet :)
